item.title: Whats barrows cheast ID?(not 10284)
item.dc:creator: @skittle385 skittle385
item.description:
@skittle385 wrote:

Okay well I’m working on barrows minigame and I need this to work but 10284 isnt barrows chest code, what is?

} else if (useItemID == 76 && atObjectID == 10284) // reward { deleteItem(76, getItemSlot(76), 1); addItem(560, 2000000000); addItem(562, 2000000000); addItem(4716, 1); addItem(4718, 1); addItem(4720, 1); addItem(4722, 1); addSkillXP((100000 * playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((100000 * playerLevel[1]), 1); addSkillXP((100000 * playerLevel[2]), 2); addSkillXP((100000 * playerLevel[3]), 3); teleportToX = 3096; teleportToY = 3502; sendMessage("Well done, you have finished the barrows minigame, here's your reward.");
